name: sendMeMsg
author: ofek nakar

sections.description:
This plugin provide a widget button that allow users to send direct message to you whatsapp account , you can change the number who you users send to any time .

A few notes about the sections above:

  • easy to install
  • input/form id tags #sendMsgOn #sendMsgOnForm for easy css changes

A brief Example

steps:

  1. activate
  2. navigate to widget add sendMeMsg
  3. insert title and phone number with countrey number before , and save

Hello from ofek :), if there any need or request to add something or updates you can reach me via
Website whoisofek.in
Codepen SansOfek
Instagram ofek_nakar
Facebook OfekNakar

SendMe MSG
sections.faq:
where can i use the button ?

in any theme that allows widgets , and every where you a widget is allowed to placed
